item.title: MASAS - Multi-Agency Situational Awareness System - Canadian Public Safety Operations Organization
item.description:
MASAS - Multi-Agency Situational Awareness System - Canadian Public Safety Operations Organization

MASAS Overview Canada's Multi-Agency Situational Awareness System (MASAS) is an information aggregation system that facilitates sharing situational awareness within the public safety community. Information shared relates to incidents and planned events. It includes public alerts, risks to responders, and community profiles.
